title: Stephan Pastis: Meet the Author
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: Stephan Pastis is the New York Times best-selling cartoonist and creator of the comic strip "Pearls Before Swine." Here he discusses his first book for young readers, "Timmy Failure: Mistakes Were Made."
